quote: A break up is the closest thing to bereavement
author: Lindsey Kelk,  I Heart New York

quote: One of the best times for figuring out who you are & what you really want out of life? Right after a break-up.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Let's still be friends"(things that are never true in a break up, but you have to say).
author: Lauren Leto

quote: Cheating and lying aren't struggles, they're reasons to break up.
author: Patti Callahan Henry,  Between the Tides

quote: Wake up, Shake up, Make up and Break up; life is all about moving like ant in search of sugar not sand.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: It ain't no broken.
author: Scott Taylor

quote: A band is a good way to break up a friendship.
author: Julian Casablancas

quote: My heart is breaking,"she says. "I want to be strong for you right now but the thought of you leaving is killing me inside.
author: Pittacus Lore,  I Am Number Four

quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram

quote: Why don’t we break up? I guess I stay with her because she stays with me. And that’s not an easy thing to do.
author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska

quote: What if I mess up?""Oh, you will. You'll mess up, you'll make mistakes, you'll break things. Some you'll be able to piece together, and others you'll lose. That's all a given. But there's only one thing you have to do for me.""What's that?""Stay alive long enough to mess up again.
author: Victoria Schwab,  The Archived

quote: The great thing about falling apart, is that you get to decide how to put yourself back together. Make good choices.
author: Stacie Hammond,  Ana J. Awakens

quote: Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship’s poison.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Sometimes two people have to fall apart, to realize how much they need to fall back together.
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: She wasn't broken. She was just bent, over the chance of being ignored by the one she loved.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: I once broke up with a boy because he wrote me an awful poem.
author: Karen Joy Fowler,  The Jane Austen Book Club

quote: Only a struggle twists sentimentality and lust together into love.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: The heart was made to be broken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Who ends up with their first real boyfriend? Yeah, no one.- Courtney
author: Lauren Barnholdt,  Two-Way Street

quote: Break the spine of one of my books and I break yours.
author: Mia James,  By Midnight

quote: It is better for the heart to break, than not to break.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
author: J.S.B. Morse,  Now and at the Hour of Our Death

quote: What barrier is there that love cannot break?
author: Mahatma Gandhi,  The Story of My Experiments With Truth

quote: Sometimes things fall apart so that better things can fall together
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Love hard--forgive harder.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Dysfunctional Love We split up not because he or she didn't love us,but because they did love us in the only way they knew how.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I called his broken promise heartbreaking, and he called it growing up. Oh, that’s mature—blame it on maturity.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.
author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.
author: Nicole Sobon,  Program 13

quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love

quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: A piece of me is gone,"she told me once while we were bra shopping. "I think we're made up of all these different pieces and every time someone goes, you're left with less of yourself.
author: Melina Marchetta,  Saving Francesca

quote: Your job is to focus on my personal happiness, she said, & I've got big plans, so break time is over.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Why be alone when we can be together babyYou can make my life worthwhileAnd I can make you start to smile
author: Mr. Big

quote: Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: Love me or hate me, i swear it won't make or break me.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: Hope for the Heartbroken A broken heartremains in piecesbut learns to love againwith every fragment.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: You can’t leave yet. I’m not finished falling in love with you.
author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9

quote: Nobody think about that broken heart... life goes on, broken heart never join together but it tries very hard to get joined again. That;swhy may be it said "Heart is like a mirror, if its broken can never be joined.
author: Shahid Islam

quote: There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: You know a relationship has deteriorated past the point of salvage when one person detests another's gestures.
author: Josephine Humphreys,  Rich in Love

quote: When things break, it's not the actual breaking that prevents them from getting back together again. It's because a little piece gets lost - the two remaining ends couldn't fit together even if they wanted to. The whole shape has changed.
author: John Green,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Living together/ is one move closer/ to living apart
author: Kristi Maxwell

quote: Broken [10w] + {Couplet} "His gifts have become broken things, hidden from my view,Sitting on a shelf, above my shoes, like exterminated Jews.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: There are all kinds of ways for a relationship to be tested, even broken, some, irrevocably; it’s the endings we’re unprepared for.
author: Katherine Owen,  Not To Us

quote: The most difficult aspect of moving on is accepting that the other person already did.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: In the end, just three things matter:How well we have livedHow well we have lovedHow well we have learned to let go
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Sometimes good things fall apart, so better things can fall together.
author: Jessica Howell

quote: Sometimes it takes falling apart to ever have a chance of being fully whole.
author: Amanda Rose
